entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SNOW, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 20
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
